description: Buses are a great option for short to medium-distance travel, connecting cities and remote areas where trains might not reach. Services range from basic state transport to luxury Volvo sleepers.
sentences: Online portals have made booking bus tickets extremely convenient.
Choose between government-run state transport and private operators.
Sleeper buses are a comfortable option for overnight journeys.
Check the bus's rating, amenities, and pick-up/drop-off points before booking.
Keep your e-ticket or a screenshot handy for boarding.
dos: Confirm the exact pick-up point and time.
Keep your valuables with you, not in the luggage compartment.
Carry some snacks and water for the journey.
Be at the pick-up point at least 15-20 minutes before departure.
donts: Don't book from shady websites or agents.
Don't rely on the bus's estimated arrival time; delays are common.
Don't get off at random stops during long journeys.
